#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{

long long t;
cin>>t;

while(t--)
{
bool check = false;
string s;
cin>>s;

        for(int i = 0 ; i < s.length(); i++ )
        {
            if(s[i]  == s[s.length()-i -1])
                check = true;
            else
        {        check  = false;break;

        }
        }

        if(check)
           cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"NO"<<endl;


}
return 0;
}
